1376310.name: Sci-fi builder
1376310.description:
Have you ever dreamed about visiting Mars or Moon? Well, may be at this moment it is a dream, but Elon Musk conquers the space and each year we are closer and closer to the possibility to visit different planets.

And while we are still waiting for the real trip to Mars you can image how your life would be there and start to build your own Sci-fi rooms and the whole station of your dreams.

In Sci-fi builder, you are free to create whatever you want.

Sci-fi builder is a simulation game about building sci-fi rooms and station. A huge selection of furniture, construction elements, computers and other interior details await you.

Arrange all elements the way you want. No placing by the grid - complete freedom of action. If you don't like where you put a piece of furniture, just move it or remove it at any time. No limits on the amount of furniture in the room.
1376310.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 保加利亚语, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 匈牙利语, 日语, 韩语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 简体中文, 瑞典语, 泰语, 繁体中文, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 越南语
